attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app, i was expecting quality content given to us by our so called âœ¨amazing presidentâœ¨. instead, i opened the app for the first time and discovered disturbing pictures of a large orange man with bad hair advertising something called ğŸ˜Œkeep america greatğŸ˜Œ. clearly his facts are wrong because this flabby looking old man was the one who destroyed the country in the first place. however, i decided to dive deeper into the appâ€™s contents to see if i could find anything that even remotely made sense. whilst i was exploring the app looking for the good content promised, i could feel my independent opinions slipping away and being replaced by sexist, and racist ones. i tried to push these thoughts out of my head by screaming ğŸ—£loudlyğŸ—£. this resulted in my brother whacking me in the head with a broomstick, which knocked the foul thoughts out of my head. my brother however, was not so fortunate. he picked up my phone and started scrolling through the Trump 2020 app, as i had done. i tried to stop him, but Mr. Trumps disgraceful ideas had already infiltrated his young mind. i tried to knock the thoughts out of him, but no matter what i did he would just keep shouting ğŸ—£trump 2020ğŸ—£. i could see the racist, sexist, and homophobic ideas reflecting in his eyes, and a red Trump 2020 hat was forming on his head. before i could stop him, he placed a Trump 2020 sign in our front yard.ğŸ¤§ğŸ˜­ğŸ¥ºI am expecting Mr. Trump to pay me 14 million dollars for the loss of my brother to his wicked ways, and i will be deleting this app IMMEDIATELY!ğŸ¤¬ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¤
